accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient's token account to receive airdropped tokens

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Now these exist thanks to init above

accounts.name: recipient
docs: Recipient claiming their airdrop (must match airdrop.recipient)

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient's token account to receive tokens

accounts.name: user_token_account
docs: The claimer’s YOZOON token account (where reflections go)

docs: The vault PDA holding the reflections

accounts.name: reflection_vault_token_account
docs: The vault’s SPL token ATA (holds YOZOON tokens)

accounts.name: yozoon_treasury
docs: The Yozoon treasury account for buybacks

docs: Admin account (pays rent and creates airdrop)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can verify milestones (might be same as admin or designated verifier)

accounts.name: ai_agent_token
docs: The new token's account (PDA derived from mint)

accounts.name: mint
docs: The token mint to be created

accounts.name: creator_yozoon_account
docs: The creator's Yozoon token account (to verify minimum balance)

accounts.name: airdrop_account
docs: The token account for the airdrop reserve

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: The creator's token account for the new token

docs: The creator who's paying for the token creation

docs: User state account to track referrals

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury account to receive the creation fee

docs: The creator who's paying for the token creation

docs: User state account to track referrals

accounts.name: creator_yozoon_account
docs: The creator's Yozoon token account (to verify minimum balance)

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury account to receive the creation fee

accounts.name: config
docs: The main Yozoon configuration (read-only for validation)

accounts.name: ai_agent_token
docs: PDA state for this user token

accounts.name: mint
docs: The SPL Mint for this new user token

accounts.name: yozoon_mint
docs: The global Yozoon token mint (used for reflections)

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Per-token treasury (for SOL raised by this mint)

accounts.name: ai_agent_token
docs: The user token account to migrate

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: The program-controlled treasury account for the token creator.

accounts.name: token_account
docs: Project token account for pool liquidity

accounts.name: sol_token_account
docs: SOL token account for pool liquidity

accounts.name: raydium_pool
docs: Raydium pool account (PDA to be created)

accounts.name: fee_key_nft
docs: Fee key NFT account (PDA to be created)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority initiating the migration (token creator or admin)

accounts.name: yozoon_treasury
docs: The Yozoon treasury account for buybacks

accounts.name: seller_token_account
docs: The seller’s token account for this mint

accounts.name: seller
docs: The seller who is burning tokens

accounts.name: user_state
docs: User state (stores referrer pubkey if any)

accounts.name: referrer
docs: Referrer account (must match user_state.referrer if Some)

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve state (decides migrated vs not)

accounts.name: reflection_vault_token_account
docs: Token account owned by Reflection Vault PDA

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority account that can verify milestones

accounts.name: task_verification
docs: Task verification account (optional, for off-chain task proofs)

accounts.name: airdrop
docs: The airdrop account to verify milestone for

errors.name: InsufficientYozoonBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient Yozoon balance to create token

types.name: AdminTransferCompletedEvent
docs: Event emitted when admin transfer is completed

types.name: AdminTransferInitiatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when admin transfer is initiated

types.name: AiAgentToken
docs: Account for storing user-created token information

fields.name: bonding_curve_params
docs: Bonding curve parameters for price calculation

fields.name: is_migrated
docs: Whether the token has migrated to Raydium

types.name: Airdrop
docs: Advanced airdrop account for milestone-based unlocking

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can verify milestones (admin or designated verifier)

fields.name: total_amount
docs: Total amount allocated for this airdrop

fields.name: milestones
docs: List of milestones that unlock portions of the airdrop

fields.name: post_claim_action
docs: Action to take after a claim (burn or buyback)

fields.name: creation_time
docs: Timestamp when the airdrop was created

types.name: AirdropClaimedEvent
docs: Event emitted when airdrop tokens are claimed

fields.name: processed_amount
docs: Amount processed by post-claim action (burned or sent for buyback)

types.name: AirdropCreatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when an advanced airdrop is created with milestones

types.name: AirdropEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are airdropped

types.name: AirdropLedger
docs: Airdrop ledger account tracking total tokens airdropped

types.name: BondingCurve
docs: Bonding curve state account storing price points and supply data

fields.name: total_sold_supply
docs: Total tokens sold via bonding curve

fields.name: price_points
docs: Precomputed price points for the curve

types.name: BondingCurveParams
docs: Bonding curve parameters for user-created tokens

fields.name: k_factor
docs: K factor for exponential curve (P = P₀·e^(k·S))

types.name: Config
docs: Configuration account holding admin info and program settings

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin public key for restricted actions

types.name: MigrationCompletedEvent
docs: Event emitted when migration to Raydium is completed

types.name: MigrationReadyEvent
docs: Event emitted when migration threshold is reached

types.name: Milestone
docs: Represents a single milestone in an airdrop

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of tokens to unlock when this milestone is reached

fields.name: expected_completion_time
docs: Unix timestamp when the milestone is expected to be completed

types.name: MilestoneStatus
docs: Represents the status of a milestone

types.name: MilestoneVerifiedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a milestone is verified

types.name: PauseStateChangedEvent
docs: Event emitted when pause state is changed

types.name: PostClaimAction
docs: Represents the type of post-claim action

types.name: PriceCalculatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when token price is calculated

fields.name: is_initialized
docs: Whether the pool has been initialized

types.name: ReferralCreatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a referral is created

types.name: ReferralFeeDistributedEvent
docs: Event emitted when referral fee is distributed

types.name: ReferrerSetEvent
docs: Event emitted when a referrer is set for a user

fields.name: airdrop
docs: The airdrop this verification is for

fields.name: milestone_index
docs: The milestone index this verification applies to

fields.name: verification_hash
docs: Verification hash (hash of the completed task proof)

fields.name: verification_time
docs: Timestamp when the verification was submitted

types.name: TokenCalculationEvent
docs: Event emitted when calculating tokens for a given SOL amount

types.name: TokenPurchaseEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are purchased

fields.name: net_sol
docs: Net SOL amount after fees (in lamports)

types.name: TokensStakedEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are staked for referral fee reduction

types.name: TokensUnstakedEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are unstaked

types.name: UserState
docs: Account for tracking user state and referrals

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total reflections already claimed by this user

types.name: UserTokenAirdrop
docs: Account for storing user token airdrop information

fields.name: token_mint
docs: The token this airdrop is for

fields.name: total_amount
docs: Total amount allocated for this airdrop

fields.name: milestones
docs: List of milestones that unlock portions of the airdrop

types.name: UserTokenAirdropClaimedEvent
docs: Event emitted when airdrop tokens are claimed

types.name: UserTokenAirdropCreatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user token airdrop is created

types.name: UserTokenAirdropExpiredEvent
docs: Event emitted when unclaimed tokens are processed after expiration

types.name: UserTokenCreatedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user token is created

types.name: UserTokenMigratedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user token is migrated to Raydium

fields.name: sol_amount
docs: SOL amount migrated to Raydium pool

fields.name: token_amount
docs: Token amount migrated to Raydium pool

types.name: UserTokenMilestoneVerifiedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a milestone is verified

types.name: UserTokenPriceEvent
docs: Event emitted when calculating token price

types.name: UserTokenPurchaseEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are purchased from a user token

types.name: UserTokenSaleEvent
docs: Event emitted when tokens are sold from a user token

fields.name: seller
docs: The seller who sold the tokens

fields.name: price
docs: Price at which tokens were sold
